French PM Lecornu rules out forcing through budget bill
subhead: In his first public statement since his appointment, Prime Minister Sébastien Lecornu announced that he would not use a contested constitutional provision to force the budget bill through without a vote.

Czech parliamentary elections revolve around support for Ukraine
subhead: Leading in the polls ahead of Friday and Saturday's vote, former prime minister Andrej Babis has challenged the aid the outgoing government has provided Ukraine. A self-defined 'Trumpist,' he appeals to older voters, who depend on welfare benefits and are nostalgic for the communist era.

title: Luxury and sensuality at Paris Fashion Week
subhead: Extravagant creatures and lascivious women: Tom Ford, Rick Owens, Mugler and Schiaparelli unveiled their visions of femininity for spring-summer 2026 with differing degrees of success.

title: Taylor Swift unveils 'The Life of a Showgirl,' her glittering 12th album
subhead: Between intimate confessions and settling scores, the star orchestrates an unprecedented global including exclusive movie events for her fans.

title: PFAS: Battle in Brussels over acceptable daily intake standards for forever chemical TFA
subhead: To set new health standards, EU authorities asked the chemical industry to provide data on TFA, which is ubiquitous in the environment. The NGO Pesticide Action Network, which got access to the studies, has accused the industry of downplaying the risks.

Yohji Yamamoto, the wise warrior of fashion
subhead: For more than four decades, the Japanese fashion designer has continued to surprise with his radical creations. His austere and rebellious style appeals to a new generation of fans, including stars such as Offset, A$AP Rocky and Burna Boy. At 81, the tireless designer unveils his latest women's collection during Paris Fashion Week on Friday.

title: France's concerns about the US plan for Gaza
subhead: The French Foreign Ministry highlighted the 'weaknesses' and 'risks' of the roadmap drawn up by the US and Israel, noting that the creation of a Palestinian state is presented only as a distant and vague prospect.

title: Trump's tariff war persists, destabilizing global trade
subhead: Six months ago, on April 2, the president of the United States unveiled his 'reciprocal tariffs' on the rest of the world. Since then, Washington has wielded the threat of new taxes to pressure its partners.
